item.title: WordPress: Moving Some Old Posts To A New Blog
item.description: I recently moved a bunch of blog posts to a new blog installation. This wasn’t necessary but just an exercise to learn what it takes to move the posts. It was easy after a lot of reading. Here is a checklist I prepared. Hope it helps someone looking for similar stuff. Comments and suggestions are welcome. Use it at your own risk! WordPress: Install WordPress. Plugins: Install necessary plugins.
